channel.title: No political ideology, whether single or mixed, will ever work
channel.description: Given time, no political ideology, whether singular or mixed in with others, can work for the human society. Throughout the course of human history, we have learned through some long, painful paths taken, that no matter what approach we have for a government, that there is not one that has worked effectively. Even today, with the democratic approach, we are running into complications with overpopulation and whatnot.

item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

USSR did nothing wrong by not dissolving it selves, you have to protect the ideology and only move forward to communism when it make sense.

By no time during it existence would it make sense in my eyes to move towards the goal (Communism), because of internal problems, WWII and the cold war. And I don’t think there is many that think that communism survived Stalin’s death, and other would say that Stalin killed it. So past 1953 Marxist-leninism was degrading in Russia.

And please prove to me that the human nature could not change.

There is five reasons why I would get rid of capitalism.

  1. It isn’t sustainable, if everyone where to consume as much as us, we would need a couple of new planets.

  2. Equality, capitalism helps to make the different bigger, and make it accumulate from generation to generation.

  3. Efficiency, we could avoid any waste, as it isn’t necessary to take the simplest solution when there is no competition, but rather take the environment and people into account.

  4. Democracy, by taking control over companies and nature resources, the democracy would have full power and not have to abide by the commands of big companies. So lobbying would no longer be such a problems. There would also be fewer interests, so everyone is working towards the same goal, and not benefits to a small segment of the population. (Tax-breaks).

  5. It could limit wars and crimes. By having a non-greed based society, this could also influence the foreign policies. And since everyone would have their needs fulfilled, you could get rid of a big chunk of crime.

item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:23, topic:437330”]They have tried communism in this country, it didn’t work.

http://freerepublic.com/focus/bloggers/2120669/posts

inb4t4saysimabrainwashedrepublican[/quote]

Although I must admit I didn’t do a thourough search, I can’t seem to find any source that supports the story in that article.

I did find another reason the settlers died, although its source is Wikipedia, the story itself sounds quite plausible:

It soon became apparent why the Virginia Indians did not occupy the site, and the inhospitable conditions severely challenged the settlers. Jamestown Island is a swampy area, and furthermore, it was isolated from most potential hunting game such as deer and bears which like to forage over much larger areas. The settlers quickly hunted and killed off all the large and smaller game that was to be found on the tiny peninsula. The low, marshy area was infested with mosquitoes (which carried malaria which killed over 135 settlers) and other airborne pests, and the brackish water of the tidal James River was not a good source of water. Many settlers died from drinking untreated water. The settlers who came over on the initial three ships were not well-equipped for the life they found in Jamestown. In addition to the "gentlemen", who were not accustomed to manual or skilled labor, they consisted mainly of English laborers.[5] Many suffered from saltwater poisoning which led to infection, fevers and dysentery. As a result of these conditions, most of the early settlers died of disease and starvation.

So the main cause of their demise wasn’t ‘Communism’, but a lack of game, malaria and other diseases, and drinking salt water.

I’m not an advocate of Communism, because I too believe it doesn’t work. But the constant ungrounded bashing of anything close to Socialism/Communism with an air of superiority (while your nation is close to it’s own downfall because of its political/economical system) is plain stupid.
